March.title: Weekly Exercism Sessions
March.description:
I'll be tackling Exercism learning paths from start to finish! Whether you're a beginner looking to learn alongside me or an experienced dev wanting to sharpen your skills, you're welcome to join the journey. I'll be working through the C# learning path on Exercism, working through challenges live. Once I complete it, the community will get to vote on the next language I take on!

Come hang out, ask questions, and level up your coding skills together!
